plot: Medea's box hides memories. These memories reach a present in which Nadia is seeking answers. A way to repair the terrible mistake that has marked her life.
title: La caja de Medea
plot_es: Medea's box hides memories. These memories reach a present in which Nadia is seeking answers. A way to repair the terrible mistake that has marked her life.
plot_en: Medea's box hides memories. These memories reach a present in which Nadia is seeking answers. A way to repair the terrible mistake that has marked her life.
